name: Meat Wagon
description: Gruesome siege engine that hurls diseased corpses at enemy buildings. Collects and transports corpses for necromancers.

abilities.name: Get Corpse
abilities.description: Picks up a nearby corpse for later use.

abilities.name: Drop Corpse
abilities.description: Drops all carried corpses at the current location.

abilities.name: Exhume Corpses
abilities.description: Generates corpses over time when stationary.

abilities.name: Disease Cloud
abilities.description: Attacks leave a cloud of disease that damages enemies over time.
